# [Interview #642: Alloy of Law Signing Report - Lord Juss, Entry #10](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=642#10)

#### Question

Were Ruin and Preservation two shards or one?

#### Brandon Sanderson

They were two shards. Harmony is considered a shard, although itâ€™s really two, in the same way that a king of two countries would still be considered a king.
